meanings.meaning_en_US: The relative extent of something; a dimension.

examples.sentence: What [size] shirt do you wear?
examples.translation_zh_TW: 你穿什麼[尺寸]的襯衫？

examples.sentence: The [size] of the house surprised us.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 房子的[大小]讓我們驚訝。

examples.sentence: Choose the right [size] for your needs.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 選擇適合你需求的[尺寸]。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A measurement of the spatial extent of an object.

examples.sentence: This box is too big for its [size].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這個箱子的[尺寸]太大了。

examples.sentence: The [size] of the cake is impressive.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 蛋糕的[大小]讓人印象深刻。

examples.sentence: They have various [sizes] of shoes.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們有多種[尺碼]鞋子。

meanings.meaning_en_US: The expression or application of human creative skill and imagination.

examples.sentence: She loves contemporary [art].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她喜愛當代藝術。

examples.sentence: The gallery features modern [art].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這個畫廊展示現代藝術。

examples.sentence: He studied [art] in college.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他在大學學習藝術。

meanings.note: Includes various forms like painting, sculpture, and performance.

meanings.meaning_en_US: From a definite time in the past until now.

examples.sentence: I have lived here [since] 2010.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我自2010年以來就住在這裡。

examples.sentence: She has been happy [since] she got the job.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她自從找到工作就很快樂。

examples.sentence: We haven't seen him [since] last summer.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我們自去年夏天就沒有見過他。

meanings.meaning_en_US: At a time in the past.

examples.sentence: He moved away and hasn't been back [since].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他搬走了，自那時起就沒有回來。

examples.sentence: I haven't eaten chocolate [since].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我自那時起就沒有吃巧克力了。

examples.sentence: They have been busy ever [since].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 自那時起他們一直很忙。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A building or part of a building where goods or services are sold.

examples.sentence: She went to the [shop] to buy some groceries.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她去商店買一些雜貨。

examples.sentence: The [shop] specializes in handmade jewelry.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這家商店專門出售手工珠寶。

examples.sentence: There’s a new coffee [shop] opened nearby.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 附近新開了一家咖啡店。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To make or become different.

examples.sentence: She decided to [change] her hairstyle.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她決定改變她的髮型。

examples.sentence: You need to [change] your mindset to grow.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 你需要改變你的心態以成長。

examples.sentence: It is time to [change] the way we work.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 是時候改變我們工作的方式。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Of a size that is less than normal or usual.

examples.sentence: He has a [small] pet dog.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他有一隻小狗。

examples.sentence: The room is quite [small].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這間房間相當小。

examples.sentence: She wore a [small] hat that looked cute.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她戴著一頂看起來可愛的小帽子。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Throughout the duration of a particular event or period.

examples.sentence: We learned a lot [during] the seminar.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 在研討會期間我們學到了很多。

examples.sentence: Do not talk on the phone [during] the movie.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 在電影期間請不要講電話。

examples.sentence: [During] the winter, it snows a lot here.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 在冬季，這裡下了很多雪。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A particular height or position.

examples.sentence: He reached a new [level] in his career.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他在事業上達到了新的[層級]。

examples.sentence: The game has several [levels] to complete.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這款遊戲有幾個[層級]需要完成。

examples.sentence: You should find a [level] surface to build on.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 你應該找一個[平坦]的表面來建造。

meanings.meaning_en_US: An intense feeling of deep affection.

examples.sentence: She has a deep [love] for music.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她對音樂有著深厚的愛

examples.sentence: He felt a great [love] for his family.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他對家人感到極大的愛

examples.sentence: Love can conquer all barriers.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 愛可以克服所有障礙

meanings.meaning_en_US: Having lived for a long time; no longer young.

examples.sentence: She visited her [old] friend from school.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她拜訪了她的老朋友，從學校出來的。

examples.sentence: The building is very [old] but has charm.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 那棟建築非常老舊，但很有魅力。

examples.sentence: He loves collecting [old] coins.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他喜歡收集舊幣。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Most important; principal.

examples.sentence: This is the [main] entrance to the building.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這是建築物的主要入口。

examples.sentence: The [main] reason for the meeting is to discuss the budget.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 會議的主要原因是討論預算。

examples.sentence: We will focus on our [main] project this quarter.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我們將集中精力在這個季度的主要項目。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To contact someone by phone.

examples.sentence: Please [call] me when you arrive.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 請在你到達時打電話給我。

examples.sentence: She will [call] you back shortly.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她會很快回你的電話。

examples.sentence: He decided to [call] his friend for advice.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他決定打電話給朋友尋求建議。

meanings.meaning_en_US: An additional one of the same type.

examples.sentence: Can I have [another] piece of cake?
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我可以再要一塊蛋糕嗎？

examples.sentence: [Another] option could be more effective.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 另一種選擇可能會更有效。

examples.sentence: He needs [another] chance to prove himself.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他需要另一個機會來證明自己。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Used to indicate the future tense, often formal or indicative.

examples.sentence: I [shall] return by evening.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我傍晚會回來。

examples.sentence: We [shall] see you at the conference.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我們會在會議上見到你。

examples.sentence: You [shall] complete the assignment by Friday.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 你應該在星期五之前完成作業。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A group of students who meet regularly to be taught a subject.

examples.sentence: In my math [class], we learned about algebra.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 在我的數學班級中，我們學習了代數。

examples.sentence: She teaches an advanced English [class].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她教授一個高級英語班。

examples.sentence: The [class] went on a field trip to the museum.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這個班級去博物館進行了實地考察。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Up to and including the present or the time mentioned; even now.

examples.sentence: She is [still] waiting for a response.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她仍然在等待回覆。

examples.sentence: It is [still] raining outside.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 外面仍在下雨。

examples.sentence: He is [still] the best player on the team.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他仍然是隊裡最好的球員。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A current medium of exchange in the form of coins and banknotes.

examples.sentence: She saved [money] for her trip.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她為她的旅行省下了錢。

examples.sentence: Money can't buy happiness.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 金錢無法購買幸福。

examples.sentence: He found some [money] on the street.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他在街上找到了一些錢。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Each one of a group without exception.

examples.sentence: [Every] student must complete the assignment.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 每個學生都必須完成作業。

examples.sentence: [Every] day is a new opportunity.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 每一天都是一個新的機會。

examples.sentence: We visited [every] museum in the city.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我們參觀了這個城市的每個博物館。
